name: Whatta Horrible Year
description:
One year everything filled with terror around us, the only thing we could do is survive.
The DEMO includes 3 levels

-HOW TO PLAY-
You can bind buttons to your liking in Options> Gameplay>Contols

  • KEYBOARD
    WASD     -Move
    ARROW KEYS -     Shoot
    ENTER -     Pause
  • CONTROLLER
    ANALOG STICKS - Move & Shoot
    "START" -    Pause

-Common problems-

  • I tried to changed the controllers and now I can't play the game-Pause the game and press F12, it will return the controls to default

This game is an early demo, we appreciate the feedback! Thank you~
